author: Daily Trust
title: Ground News - School fees’ hike will push us out of universities, Muslim students lament - Daily Trust
text:
Summary by Daily Trust The Muslim Students’ Society of Nigeria (MSSN) has decried the hike in school fees in tertiary institutions, especially universities, expressing fear that the development may push many of its members out of schools. The National Vice Chairman (Amir) Zone A comprising 19 northern states and the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Malam Muhammad Bin Isa, stated this at the 80th National Islamic Vacation Course (IVC), themed, ‘The Position of Muslims… Share menu More
